conclusion: Understanding the problem setup with points A, O1, B, and O.
Explanation of refraction when light travels from air to water.
Light bends towards the normal when entering water due to higher refractive index.
Refracted ray will intersect the boundary closer to the normal than the incident ray.
O1 must be to the left of O because the refracted ray is closer to the normal.
The statement 'Point O1 is to the right of O' is incorrect.
